top_comments.comment: I enjoyed all this thrift find diys Christina. My favourites have to be the decorative books and the napkin holders. Beautiful diys on all ❤
This whole video is my family to a T!  Music and Christmas. Jars with lights. Even the books. I'm sharing this video with my friends.

comments_since_last_sample.body: Wonderful & thrifty ideas!  The music sheet wreaths would be so cute hanging on kitchen cabinets.
